[
    Expression(
        SemicolonTerminated {
            inner: Closure(
                Closure {
                    comments: CommentGroup {
                        comments: [],
                    },
                    start: Span(
                        3,
                        1,
                    ),
                    end: Span(
                        5,
                        1,
                    ),
                    attributes: [],
                    parameters: FunctionParameterList {
                        comments: CommentGroup {
                            comments: [],
                        },
                        left_parenthesis: Span(
                            3,
                            10,
                        ),
                        members: [],
                        right_parenthesis: Span(
                            3,
                            11,
                        ),
                    },
                    return_ty: None,
                    uses: [],
                    ampersand: None,
                    body: [
                        If {
                            condition: Parenthesized {
                                left_parenthesis: Span(
                                    4,
                                    8,
                                ),
                                inner: Variable(
                                    SimpleVariable(
                                        SimpleVariable {
                                            span: Span(
                                                4,
                                                9,
                                            ),
                                            name: "foo",
                                        },
                                    ),
                                ),
                                right_parenthesis: Span(
                                    4,
                                    13,
                                ),
                            },
                            then: [
                                Expression(
                                    SemicolonTerminated {
                                        inner: Variable(
                                            SimpleVariable(
                                                SimpleVariable {
                                                    span: Span(
                                                        4,
                                                        15,
                                                    ),
                                                    name: "bar",
                                                },
                                            ),
                                        ),
                                        semicolon: Span(
                                            4,
                                            19,
                                        ),
                                    },
                                ),
                            ],
                            else_ifs: [],
                            else: None,
                        },
                    ],
                    static: None,
                },
            ),
            semicolon: Span(
                5,
                2,
            ),
        },
    ),
]
